extendedInfo.description: The Best Buy for Android app gives Canadians mobile access to everything Best Buy has to offer including the hottest items, great deals, store locator, customer reviews, and so much more.This free app is compatible with devices using the Android OS 2.2 and higher, so you can:â¢	Get instant alerts with the Best Buy widget as soon as your favourite items go on saleâ¢	Browse through a variety of products and see whatâs in stock online or in-storeâ¢	See whatâs on sale in the on-sale section or the weekly flyerâ¢	Quickly access additional online info by using the QR code scannerâ¢	View product details and specificationsâ¢	See if the item you want is in stock in-store or onlineâ¢	Make purchases with a quick and easy checkout, or choose the Reserve and Pick Up optionâ¢	Rate and review products, and read other customer reviewsâ¢	Find the closest Best Buy and store hours with the Store Locatorâ¢	Save items to your own personal Favourites listâ¢	Share your favourites on social sites like Twitter, Facebook, or email them to a friendIs there something you want to see? Rate the Best Buy Canada app and tell us how we can make your mobile shopping experience even better.

reviews.title: Good app but needs to be fixed
reviews.comment: Working for best buy, this app is good, but need some serious bug fixes. My barcode scanner finally works. But when I try to filter any searches it crashes the app. Once fixed this app would be great.
reviews.author: Myke Deneiko

reviews.title: The app is buggy
reviews.comment: The app lags a lot more than the ios version, please fix
reviews.author: Axel Kazadi

reviews.title: Pretty buggy
reviews.comment: Oddly bad, considering that it is the same company and same underlying software as the Futureshop app,  which works well.  Routinely, things are not categorized properly.  For example if you go to TVs, they have categories for LED but it will show 0 results. The only way to browse is to look at *everything*
reviews.author: Andrew Colp

reviews.title: Ok, needs some work
reviews.comment: The interface is very basic, no much in the so and would like to see some reward zone functionality so I don\'t have to carry around that stupid card.
reviews.author: Nicholas Couffin

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Good!
reviews.author: James Torrens

reviews.title: Questionable
reviews.comment: Why does this app require so many privacy invading permissions!?!
reviews.author: Bill Moen

reviews.title: Very irrelevent serches
reviews.comment: The serch is basically garbage
reviews.author: fez shahid

reviews.title: Slowwwwwww!
reviews.comment: Lazy setup, slow interface and loading. You will lose patience browsing for stuff. Waste of effort for app design for a tech store... Fix it!
reviews.author: Aaron Bouthot

reviews.title: Works ok
reviews.comment: It\'s not a bad app but has some bugs
reviews.author: Ruslan Tykhanskyy

reviews.title: Suggestions and Fixes
reviews.comment: 1) can you Improve Stability Performance.         2) Fix \"data error\".           3)Tablet Support.             4)Filters -in store and online
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: I search an item. Ipad for instance and 245 items come up.  What\'s the point of a search if it doesn\'t bring up what you are looking for.
reviews.author: Shayne Norman

reviews.title: Barcode scanner no longer works
reviews.comment: The Barcode scanner has stopped working it redirects to the website homepage or to the app homepage and doesn\'t give me any information on the products I\'m scanning, this was the only feature that separated the app from the website disappointed this app is now less useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy software
reviews.comment: Search seems to be broken or extremely limited using refine search seems to do nothing or removes all items. Very limited program.
reviews.author: Chris Zygar

reviews.title: App sucks
reviews.comment: I can\'t even use the app it crashed my phone on a total of 4 times in not even a full day, broken links, always says there is missing data crap, can\'t even search something on here and it cuts off every other process on the phone for itself which crashes everything I actually have. Yea thanks uninstalled and complete waste of time.
reviews.author: Connor Denis-Barnard

reviews.title: Mediocre at best
reviews.comment: Why do I need desperate APS for best buy Canada and Future  Shop? We all know you are the same company. Why is your app so slow to update? And search so bad?
reviews.author: Charles Gauthier

reviews.title: Best buy rocks this app is weak with broken links
reviews.comment: Garbage
reviews.author: Tyler Beach

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Show more results not working, limited and not as good as iphone app.
reviews.author: Antonio Benevento

reviews.title: Exercise in frustration
reviews.comment: Search function almost useless in that it returns too many results.  Displays the first 25 results but doesn\'t show the rest even after pressing the \342\200\234more\" button.  Now with data error. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Data Error pops up all of the time. Until they fix it this is useless.
reviews.author: Kerrie Mohninger

reviews.title: Only forum access?
reviews.comment: Junk...only allows forum access.  I\'m using Galaxy S3...highly doubt it is a compatibility issue.  Cyber Monday problem?
reviews.author: A Google User
